WRITING.TEXT:
There are actually some people that can smell pregnancy hormones.
They know someone is pregnant because they give off a slightly different natural smell.
I was like that when my ex GF was preggers, I could just "tell" she was pregnant before she even found out.
Unfortunately, what I was not able to tell was that the child wasn't mine. o3o

Why not? =O
I thought it was pretty creepy o3o
